verses.roman:
jhaḍu-ṭhākura ghara yāi' dekhi' āmra-phala
mānasei kṛṣṇa-candre arpilā sakala

synonyms: jhaḍu-ṭhākura—Jhaḍu Ṭhākura; ghara yāi'-returning home; dekhi' āmra-phala—seeing the mangoes; mānasei—within his mind; kṛṣṇa-candre—unto Kṛṣṇa; arpilā—offered; sakala—all.
translation: Upon returning home, Jhaḍu Ṭhākura saw the mangoes Kālidāsa had presented. Within his mind he offered them to Kṛṣṇa-candra.
